      • getResolvedSchematronResource

        @Nonnull
com.helger.commons.io.resource.IReadableResource getResolvedSchematronResource(@Nonnull@Nonempty
                                                                                     String sHref)
                                                                               throws IOException
        Resolve the content of the passed href to a resource
        Parameters:
        sHref - The source href that needs to be resolved relative to some base href
        Returns:
        The location of the included href
        Throws:
        IOException - In case of a resolution error
